name: Hannah Wilke
caption: Wilke in her work S.O.S. — Starification Object Series (1974)
training: Stella Elkins Tyler School of Fine Art, Temple U, Philadelphia
awards: NEA Grants in sculpture and performance, Guggenheim Grant for sculpture
summary: Hannah Wilke (born Arlene Hannah Butter; March 7, 1940 – January 28, 1993) was an American painter, sculptor, photographer, video artist and performance artist. Wilke's work is known for exploring issues of feminism, sexuality and femininity.
